ghostPost.title: How do I reactivate my Ghost(Pro) account?
ghostPost.excerpt: How to reactivate your Ghost(Pro) account.
ghostPost.meta_title: How do I reactivate my Ghost(Pro) account? - FAQ

primary_tag.description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) customers!

tags.name: Ghost(Pro)
tags.description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) customers!
tags.meta_description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) premium hosted customers!

ghostPost.plaintext:
If you previously had a Ghost.org account with publication data, your Ghost.org
account can be reactivated at anytime, however there is no guarantee your
publication can be reactivated.

To request reactivating an old account, contact support@ghost.org  from the
email address tied to the Ghost.org account.
ghostPost.html:
If you previously had a Ghost.org account with publication data, your Ghost.org account can be reactivated at anytime, however there is no guarantee your publication can be reactivated.

To request reactivating an old account, contact support@ghost.org from the email address tied to the Ghost.org account.
